MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

English.Keywords: FM Stereo Encoder MPX RDS Radio
English.Char_Desc_80: FM Stereo Encoder with RDS. Create a stereo FM radio station
English.Char_Desc_250: FM Stereo Encoder with RDS support. It can be used with an FM transmitter to produce a stereo radio station. With the RDS feature the currently playing song title and such can also be sent to the listener. Open source cross platform application.
English.Char_Desc_450: JMPX is an FM Stereo Encoder with RDS support. JMPX can be used with an FM transmitter to produce a stereo radio station. With the RDS feature the currently playing song title, station name, program type, alternative frequencies, etc can also be sent to the listener. JMPX is an open source cross platform application that can be run Windows, Linux, Mac and so on; it can even run on Raspberry Pi 2 embeded computers.
English.Char_Desc_2000: JMPX is an FM Stereo Encoder with RDS support. It can be used with an FM transmitter to produce a stereo radio station which can be received with any standard FM stereo radio. The FM transmitter gets connected to the computer soundcard and JMPX takes care of the rest. A soundcard that supports a sample rate of least 96000Hz is needed for stereo operation and 192000Hz for RDS operation. RDS operation allows transmission of information to the listener such as currently playing song title, station name, program type, alternative frequencies, etc. JMPX is an open source cross platform application that can be run Windows, Linux, Mac and so on; it can even run on Raspberry Pi 2 embeded computers.
